directions: Put the seasonings on the turkey before you put it in an oven at 50 degrees. Cook it for 5 hours. Put it on a tray and cut it up with a knife.
title: Carson's Turkey

directions: Put the lettuce and ranch in a bowl. We could heat it up if it is cold, maybe in the microwave for like 4 minutes. Stir it up to make sure it's not so hot. Now I usually put it on a plate and eat it!
title: Bella's Salad

directions: Well this is how I make corn. It's kinda dangerous and kinda yucky! So ya put logs in a pile and you burn it up in a fire. Then, you get a person to help you. You cook the corn with roast beef on a stove thing on the fire. The seeds go on the corn now. When the fire is out you can eat it!
title: Harper's Corn

directions: First you mix it all up in the bowl with a mixer or a spoon. Mommy puts them in the oven. Our oven is not that hot. They have to stay in there I think probably 8 minutes. Take them out and then you can put them on a plate and eat them!! Don't forget to lick the bowl! It's soooo good!

ingredients.name: the brown stuff that looks like sugar

title: Gracie's Brownies

directions: You can sometimes cut the potatoes with a fork if they are too big. Pour them in a bowl with all the other stuff and cook them in the microwave for 5 minutes. Mix it all up with a spoon. Then mash them with a fork. Now they are ready to eat! These are my favorite!
title: Layla's Mashed Potatoes

directions: Cook them on the stove in a pan for 30 minutes. Put the turkey on the table and the peas in a bowl. Put corn with it and also biscuits and gravy. That's my Thanksgiving meal!!

ingredients.name: peas that you pick out of the garden when they are green
Put in some pepper and that's all. Maybe like 15 of them.

title: Wayden's Peas

directions: Put the chocolate and the flour in a bowl and stir with a spoon. Pour it out of the bowl on the cake part. Flatten it all out with a spoon on the side you don't eat with. Now you have to put it in the oven. It only needs to be half hot. Set the timer for 2 or 3 minutes. Take it out and you have a chocolate pie! Dip the icing on the pie with a spoon for decoration. Put it on a plate and now you can eat chocolate pie!
title: Ragen's Chocolate Pie

directions: Set the bread in a bowl. Put it in the oven at 5 degrees for 1 minute. Put butter on it and now you eat it!
title: Bentley's Rolls

directions: Use a mixer and mix it all up. Sprinkle more salt on the cookie dough. Cook them on a stove on a pan for 4 hours. Get them on a plate. Sprinkle more salt on them before you eat them.
title: Allison's Chocolate Cookies
